front.title: Publish-Subscribe Profile for Authentication and Authorization for Constrained Environments (ACE)

abstract.t: This document defines an application profile for enabling secure group communication for a constrained Publish-Subscribe (pub/sub) scenario, where Publishers and Subscribers communicate through a broker, using the ACE framework. This profile relies on transport layer or application layer security profiles of ACE to achieve communication security, server authentication and proof-of-possession for a key owned by the Client and bound to an OAuth 2.0 Access Token. The document describes how to request and provision keying material for group communication, and protect the content of the pub/sub client message exchange, focusing mainly on the pub/sub scenarios using the Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP) [I-D.ietf-core-coap-pubsub].
